name: Radiant Gardevoir
author: Ryuta Fuse
flavor_text: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.

abilities.name: Loving Veil
abilities.effect: All of your Pokémon take 20 less damage from attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon V (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Radiant Pokémon in your deck.
